attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Under this morally bankrupt, dishonest and shameless individual, parliament has descended into the sewers. His speech shows he is unfit for the role this office demands, still less do what a decent human being would do under the circumstances and resign.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
